sentence: Other Democratic Senate candidates in the Wisconsin primary, including Milwaukee Bucks senior vice president Alex Lasry and state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, also have called for ending the filibuster.
author: Mike DeBonis
title: Democratic Senate hopefuls call for ending filibuster to pass gun laws
